content: george a knitting pattern by georgie nicolson this one-size classic wee cardigan features clean styling and smart construction to create a sweet raglan design that showcases your special statement yarn george is worked seamlessly from the top down with a crew neckline shaped using clever short row a double-rib edging frames the cardigan beautifully quick to knit and thoroughly engaging george is a design you ll return to again and again as a go-to baby gift knit sized to fit chest measurements of 15 inches/38 cms fits approximately newborn to 3 months skill level
